description:
Tesla Force is an intense procedurally generated rogue-lite top-down shooter with non-stop mayhem and over-the-top power tripping.

* Ridiculously over-the-top mayhem and power trips
* Endlessly replayable rogue-lite
* Randomly generated levels
* Wild array of devastating weapons
* Deadly scientific gadgets to help you mow down the abominations
* Multitude of crazy perks to customize your character with
* Over a dozen unique Lovecraftian horrors and boss monsters to defeat
* Play as Nikola Tesla, Marie Curie, H.P. Lovecraft, or Mary Shelley.
name: Tesla Force
